questions.question: What is the yield percentage of the synthesis of Compound a?
What method was used to analyze the morphology and element distribution of the synthesized material?
questions.answer: Transmission Electron Microscopy combined with an Energy Dispersive X-ray Spectrometer (TEM-EDS, HT-7700)

questions.question: What is the purpose of using pair distribution functions (PDF) in the study?
questions.answer: PDF were applied to analyze the changes of atom distances in materials before and after capturing ReO4-.

questions.question: What is the main challenge addressed by the research in sequestering radioactive 99TcO4-?
questions.answer: The main challenge is finding sorbents that hold efficient and selective elimination of radioactive 99TcO4- from aqueous solution and visualizing it in the sorbents.

questions.question: What are the components used in the synthesis of ZJU-X6?
What is the diameter of the one-dimensional channel viewed along the c axis in the crystal structure of ZJU-X6-Tc/Re?
Why was Ni(NO3)2·xH2O chosen as a component in the synthesis of ZJU-X6?
questions.answer: Ni(NO3)2·xH2O was chosen because Ni2+ nodes improve the positive charge density of the framework, which is beneficial for the sorption capacity and selectivity towards 99TcO4-.

questions.question: How does the structure of ZJU-X6 contribute to its ability to trap 99TcO4-?
questions.answer: The structure of ZJU-X6, with unique displaceable water pairs on the Ni2+ node and the engagement of 99TcO4- in multiple C–H…O hydrogen bonding, enhances the trapping of 99TcO4-.

questions.question: What role does the elongated organic neutral pyridyl ligand play in the formation of ZJU-X6?
questions.answer: The elongated organic neutral pyridyl ligand links with Ni2+ to yield the novel 3-fold interlocking cationic metal–organic framework, ZJU-X6.

questions.question: How does the presence of displaceable water pairs on the Ni2+ node affect the sorption mechanism of 99TcO4-?
questions.answer: The displaceable water pairs are replaced by 99TcO4-, allowing each Ni2+ to coordinate with two 99TcO4- through oxygen atoms, facilitating the sorption process.

questions.question: Why is the study of the sorption mechanism of 99TcO4- at the atomic level important?
questions.answer: Studying the sorption mechanism at the atomic level helps in understanding how 99TcO4- is trapped within the framework, which is crucial for improving the efficiency and selectivity of the sorbent.

questions.question: What is the significance of obtaining the single crystal structure of 99TcO4--incorporated ZJU-X6?
questions.answer: Obtaining the single crystal structure helps in elucidating the detailed sorption mechanism of 99TcO4- at the atomic level.
